mapper.select: SELECT id FROM media_entity WHERE folder = #{folder} AND name = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO media_entity ( folder, name, status, mdate, content_type, put_content_type, content_length, creator) VALUES ( #{folder}, #{name}, #{status}, now(), #{content_type}, #{put_content_type}, #{content_length}, #{creator})
mapper.update: UPDATE media_entity SET content_type = #{content_type}, content_length = #{content_length}, creator = #{creator}, icon = NULL, icon_content_type = NULL, mdate = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE media_entity e SET e.folder = #{new_prefix} || substring(e.folder, #{prefix_like_len}), e.mdate = now() WHERE e.folder LIKE #{prefix_like}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM media_entity e WHERE e.folder LIKE #{prefix_like}
mapper.select: SELECT e.* FROM media_entity AS e WHERE e.folder = #{folder} ORDER BY e.status DESC, e.name ASC
